	<e:Group id="grpDesk" y="80" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image width="874" height="254" y="0" source="cc_play_put_in_box" scale9Grid="55,123,6,21" x="0"/>

			<e:Image width="242" height="162" y="0" source="cc_play_put_in_item" scale9Grid="19,20,2,1" x="0" touchEnabled="false"/>

		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="thrGrp" name="thrGrp" y="30" horizontalCenter="270">
			<e:Image width="242" height="162" y="0" source="cc_play_put_in_item" scale9Grid="19,20,2,1" x="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
			<e:Image source="cc_play_put_in_bg" x="28" y="21" touchEnabled="false"/>
			<ns1:CCCardGroup id="thrGrpDeskCards" scale="0.9" interact="true" name="thrDeskGroup" currentState="my" width="236" height="158" touchEnabled="false" x="3" y="2" touchChildren="false"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label text="头道" size="24" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="center" y="205" textColor="0x887b9f" horizontalCenter="-270"/>

		<e:Label text="尾道" size="24" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="270" y="205" textColor="0x887B9F"/>
	</e:Group>
	<ns1:CCCardGroup id="handCardGroup" height="158" interact="true" horizontalCenter="0" width="1280" name="handCardGroup" currentState="my" y="340"/>
	<e:Group id="resetBtn" name="resetBtn" y="528" x="374">

		<e:Label id="lblReset" text="重置" size="28" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFFFFF" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-2" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="comparisonBtn" name="comparisonBtn" y="528" x="574">

	<e:Group id="helpBtn" name="helpBtn" y="528" horizontalCenter="200">

		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="150"/>
		</e:layout>

			<ns1:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="cc_play_btn_yellow" source.down="cc_play_btn_yellow"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="28" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" verticalCenter="-2" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" horizontalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</ns1:skinName>
		</ns1:CCLabelButton>
		<ns1:CCLabelButton id="cancelBtn" name="cancel" label="取消" y="-68" horizontalCenter="-150" x="-217" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<ns1:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="cc_play_btn_blue" source.down="cc_play_btn_blue"/>

			</e:Skin>
			</ns1:skinName>

			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="cc_play_close_btn"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Scroller id="ctxScroller" width="600" height="250" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-20" scrollPolicyV="auto" scrollPolicyH="off">
		<e:Group>

		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>
